general.byline: UX Designer in San Francisco Bay Area
general.about:
Currently, I am looking for new opportunities.

For the past 12 years, I've worked at startups and big tech companies as an interaction designer and user researcher.

— Skills Interaction design, Information Architecture, Flows&wireframes, Low-fidelity prototyping&design iteration with RITE method, Figma, HTML/CSS/Javascript/React/Swift/SQL Field study, Usability test, In-depth interviews, Web log analysis

projects.heading: Fleet Software/Dashboard for Electric Vehicle Charging and Optimization
projects.title: Fleet Software/Dashboard for Electric Vehicle Charging and Optimization

projects.heading: ChargePoint Enterprise Software Onboarding Design
projects.description: Analyzed today's pain points about activating new charging stations into ChargePoint software and designed new onboarding experience to scale the business.
projects.title: ChargePoint Enterprise Software Onboarding Design

projects.heading: Flutter/Dart DevTools
projects.description: Conducted qualitative user research on Flutter/Dart DevTools to improve Flutter developer’s debugging experience.
projects.title: Flutter/Dart DevTools

projects.heading: Knowre math district admin dashboard
projects.description: Designed the dashboard for school district administrators and math curriculum coordinators. The objective of this project was showing high level usage data across schools within a district. So district admin can monitor whether their purchased software is in good use and impact on their students math learning.
projects.title: Knowre math district admin dashboard

projects.heading: Easy way to enroll students at Knowre math
projects.description: In addition to social login, other convenient ways for teachers to manage student accounts easily were added — creating student accounts on teacher dashboard, bulk upload of student accounts — and increased teacher's productivity.
projects.title: Easy way to enroll students at Knowre math

projects.heading: Knowre math student progress data visualization
projects.title: Knowre math student progress data visualization

projects.heading: Knowre math redesign
projects.description: Our design journey to new Knowre math: What we saw as our customers problems, How we addressed those problems to better serve them.
projects.title: Knowre math redesign

projects.heading: iOS app development
projects.description: Designed, developed and launched the shopping list app.
projects.title: iOS app development

workExperience.title: Interaction designer
